function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of rainwater storage and filtration may lead to the spread of waterborne diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of waterborne disease outbreaks and contamination of drinking water.","Mitigation":"Implement rainwater storage tanks and filtration systems to reduce the risk of waterborne diseases.","Technologies":"Rainwater storage tanks, filtration systems for rainwater and greywater.","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building owners, property management"},{"Description":"Lack of measurement for water usage reduction may lead to inaccurate assessment of water-saving efficiency.","Impact":"Inability to accurately measure and verify water usage reduction, leading to potential overestimation of efficiency.","Mitigation":"Develop a standardized method for measuring water usage reduction ratio to ensure accurate assessment.","Technologies":"Smart water meters, water flow sensors, IoT-based water monitoring systems.","People":"Building owners, sustainability assessors","Owner":"Sustainability certification organizations, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Reliance on online systems without proper infrastructure may lead to accessibility and connectivity issues during a pandemic.","Impact":"Limited access to essential services and resources, affecting overall comfort and well-being.","Mitigation":"Invest in reliable ICT infrastructure and connectivity solutions to ensure accessibility during pandemics.","Technologies":"Fiber optic cables, cellular telephone networks, redundant communication links.","People":"Households, businesses, service providers","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, government authorities"}]}
